Node.definition: = state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= man; ◄ son of Jotham (יֹותָם) ► king of southern kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= state in which a countable entity is six in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= indirect male progenitor
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ made by pouring molten metal into a mold, ► and functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity

Node.english: valley of the son of Hinnom
Node.definition: literally: valley of the son of Hinnom; = valley, ◄ located west and south of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there|literally: valley of (the son(s) of) Hinnom (גֵּי בְנֵי־הִנֹּם) = valley, ◄ located west and south of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there

m.definition: literally: valley of (the son(s) of) Hinnom (גֵּי בְנֵי־הִנֹּם) = valley, ◄ located west and south of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there

Node.definition: = action by which someone causes something else to be harmed or destroyed by fire

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities take over the ownership of land from other humans, which usually implies that the former owners are driven away
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= state in which people have been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= action by which an army inflicts many casualties on the army of the enemy
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= man; ◄ son of Remaliah (רְמַלְיָהוּ) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) contemporary of Ahaz (אָחָז) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Pekah (פֶּקַח) king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man; ► governor of royal palace; time of king Ahaz (אָחָז)
= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ► second in command to king Ahaz (אָחָז)

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= town; ◄ constructed by king Omri (עָמְרִי) ► capital of northern Israelite (יִשְׂרָאֵל) kingdom until it was conquered by Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of king Ahaz (אָחָז)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart

= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

= town; ◄ constructed by king Omri (עָמְרִי) ► capital of northern Israelite (יִשְׂרָאֵל) kingdom until it was conquered by Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= state in which humans are exceedingly angry to the extent that it is visible in their appearance
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: to reach up to heaven > to greatly increase in intensity
Node.definition: literally: to reach up to heaven; hence: = process by which an event undergoes an extreme increase in intensity
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to tread underfoot; hence: = causative action by which humans use force to bring other humans and areas under their authority and control
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

literally: to add (an activity to someone else's activities); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities add additional activities to those that other humans or deities are currently engaged in

= action by which humans or deities take or maintain firm control of (other) humans or objects
= a group of people that have been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or exile
= a person wearing no or insufficient clothing, ≈ which is regarded as shameful

Node.gloss: to provide (someone) with clothes (to put on)
Node.definition: literally: to clothe; hence: = causative action by which humans provide other humans with clothes to put on

Node.gloss: to provide (someone) with clothes (to put on)
Node.definition: literally: to clothe; hence: = causative action by which humans provide other humans with clothes to put on
= causative action by which humans or deities provide (other) humans with sandals (נַעַל) to wear on their feet

Node.gloss: to make (someone) eat|to give (someone) to eat
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives other people food for consumption, sometimes with the added connotation that these people are actually forced to consume it; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to anoint oneself (with oil)|to rub (oil) on oneself|to groom oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans pour or rub liquid, usually olive oil, on their body ► to clean and smooth the skin as an act of grooming

= causative action by which humans or deities help (other) humans or animals to journey from one place to the other by accompanying them and providing them with resources and protection whenever necessary

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
literally: to stumble; hence: hence: process by which humans go through a time in which they are unable to cope with the circumstances they have to deal with
= town; ◄ located northwest of the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first town conquered by Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after they entered Canaan (כְּנַעַן)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10 20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= town; ◄ constructed by king Omri (עָמְרִי) ► capital of northern Israelite (יִשְׂרָאֵל) kingdom until it was conquered by Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jotham (יֹותָם) ► king of southern kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= person originating from Edom (אֱדֹום)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

Node.gloss: to advance upon (an area or people)|to make a raid
Node.definition: = action by which a group of armed people makes a sudden move in order to attack the people living there and steal their possessions

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the hill country (הַר) and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill country; known for its olive trees (זַיִת) and sycamore trees (שִׁקְמָה)

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► occupied by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) and home to wife of Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)
plural only: = villages or small towns that are considered part of the territory of a larger town or nation, referred to as the daughters of that larger town or nation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural only: = villages or small towns that are considered part of the territory of a larger town or nation, referred to as the daughters of that larger town or nation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man; ◄ son of Jotham (יֹותָם) ► king of southern kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= process by which an action is repeated or continued

plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= events that have taken place, that are not among a range of events that have been described or dealt with in a certain way; used for acts of kings only
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

Node.definition: = a book containing the events of the reigns of the kings of Israel and Judah
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with one's fathers; hence: = process by which a human being dies and so shares the fate and destination of his/her ancestors; ≈ only said of people in positions demanding respect, such as patriarchs and kings
= man; ◄ son of Jotham (יֹותָם) ► king of southern kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= indirect male progenitor

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man, also known as Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
